name: Artoria
description:
Artoria is a 2D Action RPG where you learn abilities from your equipment; every weapon and armor has a different ability that changes how your character behaves, and by mastering these abilities you can equip them even after your gear is off--or double the effect by equipping the gear and the ability both.

This demo represents a vertical slice of Artoria, presenting a selection of key abilities and all of the core elements the player interacts with. Have fun!
